title: On YouTube, if the imam makes prostration of recitation, must I do sajda tilawah too Assim al hakeem
transcript: uh from india she says if i'm watching a um an imam reciting the quran on a youtube channel and he reaches an ayah which has prostration of recitation and he prostrates should i prostrate as well seriously of course not what happens if he stands up and says allah obliged to pray behind him this is a link this is a video this is not something live taking place and you are there so there is no need to do that and allah knows best
